notes: tiny red flowers bloom in spring; green foliage; leaves turn crimson in the fall
fast growing tree with upright branch structure; straight and strong trunk; dark green foliage; leaves turn to gold in late fall
early spring flowing tree; remains small, with the trunk diving close to the ground; new growth is reddish purple; dark green rosy pink flowers in spring; leaves turn yellow in fall
pink petals open fully before the leaves appear; glossy dark green leaves; leaves turn shades of yellow, orange, copper and red in fall
